function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $17.99 - $16.89

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual




*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

Jensen JTV1921DC 19″ LED HD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, 16:9 LCD Panel, 1366 x 768, 12VDC, 16.7 Million Colors, White LED Illumination, 250 nit Brightness, 9ms Response Time

Jensen made just what you need to upgrade your mobile lounge. This 19″ LED HD TV runs off 12-volt power, giving you a sleek and tidy addition to your boat, RV, custom SUV, or limousine. With plenty of diverse inputs and HD capability, this screen will make the most out of anything you connect to it, whether it’s a Blu-ray player or gaming console. You can wall-mount this monitor, and the built-in speakers will broadcast strong stereo sound. The included remote control lets you control the screen and access the menu

Key Features:
– White LED Illumination
– 16:9 LCD panel, 1366 x 768 FULL HD
– DC Power
– Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner
– Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI
– CEC function with JENSEN CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players
– 16.7 Million Colors

Inputs/Outputs:
– Composite Video Input x 1 (NTSC/PAL compatible)
– Component Video Input x 1 (YPbPr) (Note: Composite/component input shares same I/O)
– Stereo Audio Input x 1
– RF x 1
– USB x 1
– HDMI input x 1
– Selectable (Variable/Fixed) Line Level Audio Output (RCA) x 1
– Digital SPDIF Audio Output (RCA) x 1

Specifications:
– Power System: DC 12 V
– Power Consumption: 20mA stand by/3.17A max
– Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
– Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
– Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
– Audio Output: 3W x 2
– Diagonal Size: 18.5″
– Resolution: 1366 x 768
– Brightness: 250 nit
– Contrast Ratio: 3000 : 1
– Display Format: 16:9
– Response Time: 9 ms
– Regulatory Certification(s): FCC
– Overall Dimensions: 17.44″ W x 10.97″ H x 1.84″ D (without stand)
– Product Weight: 5.5 Pounds
DC Power

TOUCH CONTROL DIMMABLE DESK LAMP — 5000K cool white desk lamp with 3 Brightness Levels, easily adjust the brightness by touch. Cool white lighting great suit for working, studying, reading.
FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE DESIGN — This foldable LED desk lamp with 230° flexible arm and 90° base axis, good help to save desk space. Easy to place in shelves, bags, suitcases, and box.
USB POWER (AC ADAPTER INCLUDED) — You can power the desk lamp by USB Port, easy to plug into any available USB port to power the lamp, such laptop, computer, power bank. Also, you can power by the AC Adapter which includes the package.
EYE CARING TABLE LAMP — This touch table lamps are designed to be soft, stable, and non-flickering light. The office desk lamp adopts surface led light source design which could perfectly eliminate glare, visual fatigue, and improve visual effects.
PREMIUM SERVICE&LONG LIFESPAN–Our led light designed to last for more than 50000 hours, you won’t replace the LED in the next 25 years,The desk lamp led comes with 365 days worry-free service and lifetime nice customer service.Just order this touch lamp without any risk.

From the brand

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ！

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

【Stepless Dimming with two control ways】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
【Space Saving and Modern Style】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
【Quality Warranty】SHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

Specifications:

Material: metal + silicone

Light bar length: 18.2 inch/ 46 cm

LED numbers: 96 Led beads

Lumen: 1511 Lumen

Brightness: 6 levels

Color temperature: 3000K-6000K

CRI: RA>95

Control type: Touch & Remote

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading.

  • No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently
  • 360°flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction
  • Durable structure with metal and silicone
  • Metal Clamp: 2.6 inch/7.5 cm thickness desk edge
  • Maximum Lighting height: 28.5 inch

Read more

HIGH COLOR RENDERING

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

It supports two types to control the study lamp

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

  • Short touch will change the color
  • Holding touch will change the brightness

Remote Control

  • Dimming Up / Down: 6 Brightness levels
  • Colors Select: Warm white / white / warm
  • Timing setting: 3 minutes(one press)/ 30 minutes( twice)/60 miutes(three times)
  • Mode select: Sleeping mode / Reading mode

SUPER BRIGHT DESK LAMP, SUITABLE for DETAILED OPERATION

𝗔 𝗦𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗘𝗡 𝗧𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗟𝗢𝗢𝗞𝗦 & 𝗙𝗘𝗘𝗟𝗦 𝗕𝗘𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗥 – Kobo Sage’s 8″ flush, high definition E Ink Carta 1200 touchscreen offers deep contrast, super-clear readability, and faster page turns on an expansive display. The eye-catching glare free HD display with ComfortLight PRO allows for brightness and blue light control. Dark Mode offers a new way to reduce eyestrain
𝗔 𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗦𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗟𝗘 𝗧𝗢𝗢𝗟 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗗𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗘𝗥𝗦 – Designed from the ground up with a quad-core CPU and faster, dual band WiFi to deliver top performance in one elegant package. Sleek and lightweight, Kobo Sage feels perfect in your hands in landscape or portrait mode. Page-turn buttons keep the story moving with one hand. Ergonomically designed and fully waterproof*, Kobo Sage is with you from the conference table to the bath tub. Welcome to the lap of luxury
𝗖𝗔𝗣𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗜𝗠𝗔𝗚𝗜𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 & 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬 𝗧𝗛𝗢𝗨𝗚𝗛𝗧 – Kobo Sage works seamlessly with Kobo Stylus** (sold separately), to allow you to make handwritten notes in eBooks and PDFs***. Kobo Sage’s built-in notebook feature keeps all of your notes at hand and can convert your writing to clean text. The possibilities are limitless
𝗨𝗡𝗟𝗢𝗖𝗞 𝗨𝗡𝗟𝗜𝗠𝗜𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗣𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗜𝗔𝗟 – Share everything with Dropbox Support. Add your own eBooks and documents wirelessly, export notebooks you’ve made with Kobo Stylus**, and keep everything on-hand with cloud storage
𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗 𝗢𝗥 𝗕𝗘 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗 𝗧𝗢 – Kobo Audiobooks support with Bluetooth wireless technology lets you dive into a story when your hands are tied. Audiobooks available only in select countries. Bluetooth wireless headphones or speaker required

A screen that looks and feels better

A luxurious 8″ flush, high definition E Ink Carta 1200 touchscreen

Capture your imagination and every thought

Kobo Sage works seamlessly with Kobo Stylus** (sold separately), to allow you to make handwritten notes in eBooks and PDFs*** and create notebooks to capture your ideas.

**Kobo Stylus sold separately, not included ***PDFs with digital rights management or permission limitations are not compatible with markups or annotations

The immersive reading experience; read, write, and listen in luxury

Our best eReader yet with every feature Kobo has to offer, plus Bluetooth wireless technology so you can listen to Kobo Audiobooks†

†Audiobooks available only in select countries. Bluetooth wireless headphones or speaker required.

Read more

How can Kobo Sage take your reading life even further?

  • Ergonomic design with landscape mode and page-turn buttons
  • Waterproof
  • 32GB of storage
  • ComfortLight PRO with blue light reduction

The immersive reading experience

Introducing Kobo Sage, our most accomplished eReader ever. Designed to inspire you with every read, Kobo Sage delivers every feature Kobo offers in one sleek package, plus Bluetooth wireless technology so you can listen to Kobo Audiobooks*

*Audiobooks available only in select countries. Bluetooth wireless headphones or speaker required.

Read more

Warranty & Support

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Leotachi is a professional manufacturer of waterproof bathroom mirror TVs.

Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom

Screen Support 360° Rotation（New upgrade）Lock Screen Function（New upgrade）High-Speed Processor RK3288 (Smooth Operation）Touch Screen and IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Double Control)Automatic Defogging FunctionIP66 High-grade Waterproof

Upgraded mirror TV

Bright and Clear Screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and 500nits high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers(10w), Leotachi TV provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.

Luxury bathroom mirror tv

When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a Multifunctional TV and a luxury mirror at the same time.

Multipurpose mirror tv

Leotachi mirror TV has advanced performance, can support watching movies, listening to music, playing games, etc.,

Different Bathroom Mirror TV – 360° rotating

IP66 waterproof 1080P bathroom mirror TV system supports rotating the screen by 360°. We also recommend that you can choose a 360° rotating bracket (Available at Leotachi stores), and you can switch the angle and distance you want at will.

Multiple layers of materials are superimposed to make it waterproof and fog-proof

Package included:

When you receive the goods, please carefully confirm whether it is complete.

1 x 21.5inch Bathroom Mirror waterproof TV 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control(Need extra CR2025 battery)） 1 x Wall Bracket 1 x Installation Manual 1 x DC 12V Adapter

Professional Waterproof Level Mirror TV

A waterproof TV that is safe to use around humid environment. The TV is typically sealed in such a way that they can be splashed, rained on, submerged in water and other liquids and still function.

1. Waterproof Level : IP66 2. Overall size : 515(W)*312(H)*36(D)mm / 23.7 inch 3. Screen size: 476(W)-268(D)mm / 21.5 inch 4. Resolution: 1920*1080 5. Net Weight: 5.5KG 6. Working Temperature: -40 ~76°C 7. Power consumption : 60W (standby≤1W) 8. Speaker Power: 10w*2.

For Women

You can use Leotachi’ TV to watch your favorite movies or short videos.

For Men

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite competitions or news

For Kids

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite cartoons or play games

For Family

You can use Leotachi’TV to improve family harmony and get everyone in the family to love bathing!

IMPORTANT NOTICE

· Mirrors Damaged/Chipped on Arrival,No return needed.

· All you need to do is sending us photos.We will provide you with the most satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

· Please check the outer package while receiving, only accept whole package. And please check whether the mirror is intact.、

【Upgraded Smooth Touch Screen System】The mirror TV is a 10-point touch screen technology that supports a variety of gestures, you can also freely choose touch screen or remote control. The system uses a high-speed processor RK3288 – Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17 architecture to ensure smooth operation when using.
【Upgraded Brightness and Volume】Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V adapter, The brightness of 500cd/m2 is brighter than similar products on the market, bringing you different visual effects; in addition, the dual-speaker design allows you to hear clearly in noisy environments; better heat dissipation fast and prolong the service life of the product.
【Multifunctional luxury mirror】 When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a multifunction TV and a luxury mirror at the same time. Leotachi’s TV has a professional-grade IP66 waterproof rating, and the screen is automatically defogged without additional operation. especially suitable for some wet or extreme places, such as bathroom, shower, kitchen, swimming pool, yacht, sauna, spa, hot tub, steam room, etc.
【Installation and After Sales】 The Leotachi Bathroom TV comes with a wall mount bracket that can be easily installed in a wall recess or fixed to the wall by just one person. leotachi Bathroom TV is professionally certified and we offer a 1 year warranty. Please feel free to contact us for more details, all messages will be answered within 24 hours.

Leotachi Waterproof Mirror TV

  2. What can leotachi do?

    Leotachi are professional manufacturer who are specializes in waterproof electronics, such as Waterproof display, Waterproof Bathroom Smart Mirror, Outdoor waterproof TV, Store advertising machine etc…

    Why do we do it well?

    Leotachi always provides our best products with reliable quality and professional technology. Provides you with stunning picture quality and smart features and functions.

    What makes our products unique?

    We are committed to offer our customers a variety of Leotachi TV. We always keep an eye on the latest trends in TV and put our customers’ wishes first.

  3. Leotachi Bathroom Mirror TV

    We always put our customers’ wishes and experience first.

𝗚𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 & 𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗩𝗘𝗗 𝗦𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗘𝗡 – Kobo Libra 2’s improved 7″ HD E Ink Carta 1200 touchscreen delivers a faster display, quicker page turns, and deeper contrast. Always glare-free—unlike your smartphone or tablet. ComfortLight PRO’s adjustable brightness and blue light reduction technology limits eyestrain and lets you read well into the night, without affecting your sleep. Dark Mode offers the option of white text on a black background
𝗔𝗦 𝗔𝗗𝗔𝗣𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗔𝗦 𝗬𝗢𝗨 𝗔𝗥𝗘 – Kobo Libra 2’s ergonomic design feels good in your hands. Keep the story moving by swiping the touchscreen, or use the page-turn buttons when one of those hands is full. You also have the option to read in landscape mode. Whether it’s post-workout, on the bus, or nursing your little one back to sleep, Kobo Libra 2 is made to fit your busy life
𝗟𝗜𝗦𝗧𝗘𝗡 𝗔𝗧 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗟𝗘𝗜𝗦𝗨𝗥𝗘 – Kobo Libra 2 supports Kobo Audiobooks with Bluetooth wireless technology. Think of it as a hands-free reading option, for those super busy days. (Audiobooks available only in select countries. Bluetooth wireless headphones or speaker required)
𝗙𝗨𝗟𝗟𝗬 𝗪𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗢𝗙* – You can take your story to the park, the beach, the tub, or even out in the rain. Life happens, rain or shine, now your reading life can, too. *Meets requirements of IPX8 rating. Waterproof for up to 60 minutes in up to 2 metres of water
𝗙𝗨𝗟𝗟 𝗢𝗙 𝗣𝗢𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗕𝗜𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗜𝗘𝗦 – 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗨𝗣 𝗧𝗢 𝟮𝟰,𝟬𝟬𝟬 𝗕𝗢𝗢𝗞𝗦 – Kobo Libra 2 comes with 32GB of storage, enough to hold your entire library. Take up to 24,000 eBooks, 150 Kobo Audiobooks, or a combination of both with you, everywhere you go. Whatever your latest read or listen, it’s always on hand

A go-anywhere design sure to make a splash

Kobo Libra 2 is fully waterproof* with a glare-free 7″ screen and the latest E Ink technology.

*Meets requirements of IPX8 rating. Waterproof for up to 60 minutes in up to 2 metres of water

Listen at your leisure

Enjoy Kobo Audiobooks* with Bluetooth wireless technology.

*Audiobooks available only in select countries. Bluetooth wireless headphones or speaker required.

Full of possibilities—and up to 24,000 books

Kobo Libra 2 comes with 32GB of storage, enough to hold your entire library.

Read more

Your eReader, your story

The next-generation Kobo Libra 2 is the embodiment of your reading style. With more storage, a faster E Ink screen, and Bluetooth wireless technology so you can listen to Kobo Audiobooks*, Kobo Libra 2 is an integral part of your rich reading life.

*Audiobooks available only in select countries. Bluetooth wireless headphones or speaker required.

How can Kobo Libra 2 take your reading life even further?

  • Ergonomic design with landscape mode and page-turn buttons
  • ComfortLight PRO with blue light reduction
  • Battery life that lasts for weeks
  • Save and read online articles with Pocket

Read more

𝗚𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗘-𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 𝗧𝗢𝗨𝗖𝗛𝗦𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗘𝗡 – Read in the sun easily on a glare-free 6” touchscreen. Unlike your tablet or smartphone, this eReader screen is glare-free, so you can enjoy reading in direct sunlight, just like real paper
𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗥𝗬 𝗨𝗣 𝗧𝗢 𝟲𝟬𝟬𝟬 𝗕𝗢𝗢𝗞𝗦 – With 8GB of storage take your entire book collection everywhere you go. Browse over 6 million titles at any time, on the built-in Rakuten Kobo eBookstore

With adjustable margins, the ability to highlight passages, write notes, and a built-in dictionary at the tap of a finger, the possibilities are endless
𝗟𝗢𝗡𝗚 𝗟𝗔𝗦𝗧𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗕𝗔𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗬 𝗟𝗜𝗙𝗘 – The Kobo Nia eReader has a battery life that lasts for weeks*, so you can experience uninterrupted reading on a single charge. *Dependent on individual usage

Carry up to 6,000 eBooks anywhere you go.

With 8GB of storage, Kobo Nia accommodates even the largest of libraries.

Read in the sun on a 6” glare-free touchscreen.

Enjoy reading on the brightest of days without glare.

Enjoy reading at night with built-in ComfortLight

Adjust your screen’s brightness and read without disturbing your sleeping partner.

Read more

Our friendliest eReader yet

Escape into a story, learn something new, and remember why reading is fun. Kobo Nia’s a big deal in a small package: you can carry up to 6,000 eBooks with its 8GB of storage. Bask in the sun with your favorite read on its glare-free 6” touchscreen, or snuggle up with a bedtime story thanks to adjustable ComfortLight. Read as much as you’d like with Kobo Nia’s long battery life, where a single charge can last for weeks*. And when you’re ready for your next read, the Kobo eBookstore is open 24/7 right on your eReader.

How can Kobo Nia take your reading life even further?

  • Battery life that lasts for weeks
  • Built-in OverDrive for library book borrowing
  • Save and read online articles with Pocket
  • Customizable fonts, margins, built-in dictionary and more

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $1,199.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 01:53:43 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Haocrown 27 inch Bathroom TV Mirror with Smart Touch Screen

The big achievement of Haocrown waterproof bathroom TV is full touch screen which using projected capacitive 10-point touch technology for fluid response.

With updated H2 quad-core chipset and smooth touch brilliant screen, you can save more time and control the TV and enjoy more entertainment.

Even the TV screen is wet with water, you can easily and safely browse through all the available options, choose your favorite programs, change the volume and turn on/off the TV with simply touch control.

Control TV with Voice Remote

Come with IP68 waterproof remote and Bluetooth voice remote.

Built-in Dolby Atmos

Support external ceiling speakers, build up cinematic surround sound.

Easy to Connect

Easy to connect 5GHz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth, cable TV, external HDMI devices etc.

1 Voice Control 2 Built-in Dolby Atmos 3 Easy to Connect

Shared Experience from Our Customers Terrific Touchscreen Bath TV

The set’s image is bright and sharp. The mirror face when off and the picture when the TV set is on, both look great. Touchscreen feature is fabulous.

Excellent product

Very easy to fit. Picture is good, and it is magical when it sits behind the mirror. Looks great works great. Better than expected.

Working Good

Great product . Easy to set up and very easy to get on WiFi. Adding a speaker definitely improves the sound.

Bathroom Mirror TV

Love this TV in my bathroom. The mirror looks like a 100% mirror when TV is off.

LED Screen Display Size: 27 inch (Diagonal) Finished Surface： Mirror (High quality nano-silver glass) IP66 Waterproof Rating: Triple waterproof treatment, anti-fog, dust-proof Three Control Types: Full touch screen control & Bluetooth voice remote & IP68 Waterproof IR remote Built-in Smart System: Android 11.0 (Updated H2 Chip), better, smarter and safer RAM 8GB & ROM 64GB: Large memory support running smoother and more stable system. Wireless Connections: Dual band 5Ghz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth 4.2. Updated Highlight LED Screen: Brightness 500 offer brighter and vivid television picture quality. Resolution: 1920×1080, 16:9, 178° H/ V viewing angles. Cable TV Channel Support: Built-in ATSC tuner, support digital TV programmes. Speakers: Built-in two waterproof speakers(8Ω x 5W), support 3.5mm audio output interface. Support Interfaces: HDMI, LAN, TV Input, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Audio Output, DV 12V Input. Product Dimensions: 26.7 x 17.6 x 1.7 inch Package Weight: 33.5 bl Installations: Wall mounted or recessed into wall installations Package List: 1 x 27-inch Touchscreen Mirror TV, 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control, 1 x Bluetooth Remote, 1 x Embedded Bracket, 1 x Wall Bracket, 1 x Installation Manual, 1 x HDMI Cable

Safe Waterproof TV for Bathroom: All Haocrown waterproof TVs have passed IP66 high waterproof rating, triple waterproof treatment, anti-fog, dust proof and powered with safe low voltage DC 12V, which specially designed for using in any humid and dust conditions, such as luxury bathroom, saunas, hotel spa, kitchen etc.
2-IN-1 Vanishing TV Mirror Design: The bathroom TV is completely embedded within a luxury mirror. Vanishing glass technology makes it possible for a television to completely disappear when turned off. Haocrown high brightness 500 LED television panels are brighter than typical indoor TVs, delivering you smooth high-definition images.
Running Smart Android 11.0 System and HDTV Digital TV: Comes with smart Android 11.0 system in HDMI 2 channel, resolution 1920×1080, easy to connect dual band 5GHz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth, explore your favorite shows via rang of apps like YouTube, Netflix etc. RAM 8GB, ROM 64GB, upgraded H2 chip and large memory make ensure running programs better, smarter and safer. Built-in ATSC tuner, supports digital HDTV programs.
Easy to Install, Wall Mounts Inchuded: The 27 inch waterproof bathroom tv can be fitted either recessed mount (in wall) or surface mount (on wall). The package will come with both embedded bracket and wall bracket and full installation manual. We offer customized service and worry-free 12-month experience and 12-hour kindly customer response. Contact us by below steps: Go to the product page– click ” Haocrown-us” (under “Add to Cart”), then click “Ask a question”.

Previous page

  2. Haocrown is a manufacturer specializing in waterproof televisions, it was founded in 2012 with its opportunities gained from modernizing science and technology and smart home market trend continues to grow.

    With IP66 waterproof and powered with safe low voltage DC 12V specific design, updated smart mirror touch screen function, Haocrown waterproof indoor TVs are widely used luxury hotel, bathroom, shower, steam room any wet and humid conditions.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $36.10
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:54:11 UTC – Details)



The big & bold LED display gives you more than just the time at a glance – instantly know the weather, humidity and temperature outside from across the room
This smart alarm clock is your nightstand companion, with an auto-dim display for a peaceful night that still lets you see the time when you need to; tap on top to dismiss an alarm or snooze
We put privacy first – there’s no camera on this smart clock, plus you can turn on the mute switch to disconnect the microphones
The smart speaker lets you stream songs from Amazon Music and others, or listen to audiobooks and podcasts; you can continuously listen around the house by creating speaker groups
